com.googlecode.jmxtrans.model.output

Class RRDToolWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.jmxtrans.util.BaseOutputWriter
      • com.googlecode.jmxtrans.model.output.RRDToolWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputWriter

    public class RRDToolWriter
extends BaseOutputWriter
    This takes a JRobin template.xml file and then creates the database if it doesn't already exist. It will then write the contents of the Query (the Results) to the database. This method exec's out to use the command line version of rrdtool. You need to specify the path to the directory where the binary rrdtool lives.
    Author:
    jon
